pyCoalesce.classes.URL_class module¶

This class is simple a subclass of unicode with a __new__() method that adds a check for a valid URL scheme. The class can be imported directly from the pyCoalesce.classes module.

@author: sorr

class pyCoalesce.classes.URL_class.URL¶

Bases: unicode

Adds a check to the vanilla “unicode” constructor to make sure the value is a valid and supported URL of a scheme appropriate for a RESTful server (that is, HTTP or HTTPS).

VALID_SCHEMES = (u'http', u'https')¶

pyCoalesce
